name: Magic Fighting Princess Lil Steer
description:
Contents of works------------

The evil army Hamelder suddenly appeared.
The combatant roams night after night, aiming for a young woman and kidnapping him.

Appeared quickly to protect the city from such a mean Hamelder
Girls who call themselves magic fighting princesses.

A fierce battle was fought almost every night.

System contents -----------
Lilstia shows a gap during battle and after defeat
Hamelder's combatants are mercilessly insulted.

Battle erotic, post-defeat event, etc.
Prepared for each chapter.
